title: Does Apple have plans for 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, Apple has plans for 5G. Apple purchased Intel’s modem division and will be manufacturing their own 5G modems. They are right now in the process of designing them. Apple-branded 5G modems should be available by 2022.[1] In the meantime they will be using 5G modems from Qualcomm in their iPhones starting in the fall of 2020. Footnotes[1] Apple Pushing Hard to Roll Out Own 5G Modem for iPhones by 2022 | Digital Trends
